comment: I thought I was the only one who thought she was kinda condescending, glad I was not tripping. However, in person, she is very helpful with the labs. She goes over the labs with the class, along with the videos. The class itself can be easy if you understand and have done the labs.
I do not review teachers but she is terrible. The class itself stinks so taking it with her who you can hardly understand makes it the worst.  You just go through 50,000 sheets of excel.
She was kinda rude but always laughed it off. She gives so much homework and takes forever to grade it. Homework genuinely takes weeks. Not worth it in my opinion.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Lecture heavy

comment: She is VERY condescending and doesn't know how to talk to people. She is a tough grader, and a slow one. And does not "take accountability." She gives lots of work, and it takes weeks to complete a single assignment. Would not take again at all.
